body:
Francesco,

I just wanted to note that this conversation about the comparison of ENVI-MET and OpenFoam has a parallel thread here:

[https://github.com/mostaphaRoudsari/Butterfly/issues/15](https://github.com/mostaphaRoudsari/Butterfly/issues/15)



Also, you can find GH files for the outdoor comfort workflow that Theodore described on this conversation:

[https://github.com/mostaphaRoudsari/Butterfly/issues/14](https://github.com/mostaphaRoudsari/Butterfly/issues/14)



-Chris
